transcript_chunks.text: what episode are you on of suits I thought you wanted it today I [ __ ] saw you Nick what do you mean Tom Washington was he watching it work I was eating lunch just keeps [ __ ] watching Suits and it's just the funniest thing everyone else could watch [ __ ] twitch streamers when they're eating lunch I can't watch suits I can't watch it upstairs or something I'm about to mention this and I don't think he realized that I was listening or that he was even speaking audibly he has his headphones on I don't like this I don't know what's happening on screen he goes that's hot they wear like Tom Ford suits in the show it's [ __ ] great on your lunch break not at work though you guys are acting like watching porn at work for Christ's sake no that would be less weird honestly like
